name: Tuning Champions
description:
Join our discord community to stay up to date and tell us your opinion! We are waiting for you!

What is Tuning Champions?

Tuning Champions is a PvP Multiplayer Racing Game. The objective is to race against other players to earn money. Utilize the money to upgrade and customize your vehicle in order to win! We´re offering you a complex vehicle tuning system with ALOT of tuning possibilities. Tuning Champions has amazing and stunning landscapes and maps!




  • Multiplayer with up to 15 players
  • Complex Vehicle Tuning System
  • Stylized Polygon Art Style
  • Just Fun!


Tuning Champions features a complex vehicle tuning system with presets, visual effects and more!

Vehicle Tuning Options (for each vehicle)

  • 25+ Skins
  • 25+ Rims
  • 5+ Tires
  • 5+ Front & Rear Bumper
  • 5+ Hoods, Spoiler, Skirts etc.
  • Custom Wheel Settings (Suspension, Camber & Size)
  • Custom Smoke, Light & Hud Colors
  • and even more...



Multiplayer is a big part of every racing game! We use Photon to offer you the best multiplayer experience.

Your Home

The huge harbor in the middle of the ocean is your home. Here is your garage and tuning shop located where you can buy, upgrade and customize vehicles!
In order for you to determine the best vehicle we have a test track with a drifting area in the middle. Test them all and find your favorite!

The Lobby

The lobby looks the same as your home, except without any tuning or garages. Enjoy waiting until the lobby is full by driving, crashing and just having fun with he other players. Show off your driving skills and vehicle!

The Race

You will race against 14 other players within 3 rounds. Wait for the green signal and you´re off! Be sure to warm your tires tho!

Earning Money

The final amount of money you´ll earn after a race is determined by your position, time as well as how often you had to reset your vehicle! It's probably good to drive a little cautiously.





We believe our community should be able to contribute to the game. Whether it's voting or general suggestions, join our Discord and get involved!
